Verses: 1 raajakumaaraththiye! Paadharatchaigalitta Un Paadhangal Migavum Azhagaayirukkiradhu; Un Iduppin Vadivu Visiththirath Thozhirkaararin Velaiyaagiya Pooshanampolirukkiradhu.
2 un Naabi Dhraatcharasam Niraindha Vattakkalasam Polirukkiradhu; Un Vayiru Leeli Pushpangal Soozhndha Kodhumai Ambaarampolirukkiradhu.
3 un Irandu Sthanangalum Velimaanin Rattaikkuttigalukku Samaanamaayirukkiradhu.

4 un Kazhuththu Yaanaiththandhaththinaal Seydha Koburaththaippolavum, Un Kangal Esponile Padhrapeem Vaasalandaiyilirukkum Kulangalaippolavum, Un Mookku Thamaskuvin Thisaiyai Nokkum Leebanonin Koburaththaippolavum Irukkiradhu.
5 un Sirasu Karmel Malaiyaippolirukkiradhu; Un Thalaimayir Raththaambaramayamaayirukkiradhu; Raajaa Nadaikaavanangalil Mayanginirkiraar.
6 manamagizhchchiyai Undaakkum En Piriyame! Nee Evvalavu Roobavadhi, Nee Evvalavu Inbamullaval.
7 un Uyaram Panaimaraththozhungupolavum, Un Sthanangal Dhraatchakkulaigalpolavum Irukkiradhu.
8 naan Panaimaraththileri, Adhin Madalgalaip Pidippen Endren; Ippozhudhum Un Sthanangal Dhraatchakkulaigalpolavum, Un Mookkin Vaasanai Kichchilippazhangalpolavum Irukkiradhu.
9 un Thondai, En Nesar Kudikkaiyil Medhuvaayirangugiradhum, Urangugiravargalin Udhadugalaip Pesappannugiradhumaana, Nalla Dhraatcharasaththaippolirukkiradhu.
10 naan En Nesarudaiyaval, Avar Piriyam Enmelirukkiradhu.
11 vaarum En Nesare! Vayalveliyil Poi, Graamangalil Thanguvom.

12 adhikaalaiyile Dhraatchaththottangalukkup Povom; Dhraatchakkodi Thulirththu Adhin Poo Malarndhadho Endrum, Maadhalanchedigal Pooppooththadho Endrum Paarppom; Ange En Nesaththin Uchchidhangalai Umakkuth Tharuven.
13 thoodhaayeem Pazham Vaasanai Veesum; Namadhu Vaasalgalandaiyile Pudhiyavaigalum Pazhaiyavaigalumaana Sagalavidha Arumaiyaana Kanigalumundu; En Nesare! Avaigalai Umakku Vaiththirukkiren.
